name: HTMLElement.hidden
description: The HTMLElement property hidden is a Boolean which is true if the element is hidden; otherwise the value is false. This is quite different from using the CSS property display to control the visibility of an element.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLElement.hidden' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
